AutoColor(Color, Int32, Single, TextureCluster)

Automatically paints the layer based on existing data. The input/output is in Terrain shading format (color packed with indexes in r/g and blend in b)

Declaration
public static Color AutoColor(Color existing, int index, float r, TextureCluster cluster = null)
Parameters
Type Name Description
UnityEngine.Color existing

existing color data in terrain shader format
System.Int32 index

Index of texture to apply.
System.Single r

The brush weight.
TextureCluster cluster

Optional texture cluster when using clusters. Used for search.
Returns
Type Description
UnityEngine.Color
